thread.title: Abhilash Kumar Y appointed CEO of Uralungal Labour Contract Co-operative Society group
thread.title_full: Abhilash Kumar Y appointed CEO of Uralungal Labour Contract Co-operative Society group - timesofindia-economictimes

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Abhilash Kumar Y appointed CEO of Uralungal Labour Contract Co-operative Society group
text:
KOCHI: Abhilash Kumar Y , who was the regional manager of the Infosys, has been appointed as the Chief Executive Officer of the Uralungal Labour Contract Co-operative Society (ULCCS) group, a noted co-operative venture in Kerala.
Abhilash joined in Infosys in 1997 and has played important role in different areas including facilities management, infrastructure development, corporate relations and consumer relationship management.
Holder of post-graduate from the IIMK and a master's degree from Pune University. Abhilash also served as the management advisor to the ULCCS since 2011. He is currently engaged in the diversification initiatives of the ULCCS.
